channel.title: Joe Preston
channel.description: Recent news about Joe Preston, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk 1290
item.description:
Talbotville Ford Plant In Limbo
Elgin Middlesex London MP Joe Preston says a deal that was reported in May that would see the site developed and that would bring more than 15-hundred jobs, hasn't materialized. Preston says there was never any word on what kind of business could be ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:

item.title: Posted on Twitter
